house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1983 has 4 bedroom(s), 2.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2520 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential California Realty Prudential California Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
